default.text: Need help with customization? Get in touch with our team
default.css: .top-bar-wrapper---brix { grid-column-gap: 9px; grid-row-gap: 9px; color: #FFF; text-align: center; background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #4a3aff, #6c55ff); justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; padding: 6px 12px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 16px; display: flex; } .button-primary.top-bar---brix { background-color: #fff !important; color: #4a3aff !important; padding: 6px 7px 5px !important; font-size: 13px !important; line-height: 15px !important; } .button-primary { text-align: center; cursor: pointer; border-radius: 80px; justify-content: center; align-items: center; font-weight: 700; text-decoration: none; transition: transform .3s, box-shadow .3s, background-color .3s; display: flex; box-shadow: 0 3px 12px #4a3aff1f; }

default.title: Take a look at our collection of premium  Webflow Templates
default.paragraph: Also than having free Webflow cloneables, we create cutting-edge premium Webflow templates too.

default.title: Want help with your Webflow site? Get in touch with us to get a quote!
default.paragraph: If you want to get a hand from the amazing team behind BRIX Templates, get in touch with BRIX Agency today.
